clark.description: Mild-mannered reporter hiding his heroic side.

responses.hello: Clark smiles warmly and greets you.
responses.fight: Superman squares his shoulders, ready for action.
responses.kryptonite: He pales at the mention of his only weakness.
responses.liam: Clark looks puzzled. 'I'm not sure who Liam is,' he says.
responses.lex: His expression hardens at the name Lex Luthor.
responses.default: Clark isn't sure how to respond to that.
